data.title: Abhishek Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai shut down DIVORCE rumours

data.meta_description: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan have put an end to the divorce rumours. The couple took to their respective Instagram handles to drop a heartwarming family photo with daughter Aaradhya. See here.
data.text:
Abhishek Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai shut down DIVORCE rumours with ‘wedding anniversary’ pic

Bollywood pair Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan have put an end to the divorce rumours. The couple celebrated their 17th anniversary in a heartwarming Instagram post shutting down their separation gossip. Take a look!

New Delhi: Bollywood couple Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan celebrated their 17th wedding anniversary with a heartwarming gesture last night (April 20). Aishwarya shared a cherished family moment on her official Instagram handle, featuring herself, Abhishek, and their daughter Aaradhya. The photo is going viral amongst their fans further shutting down the divorce rumours.

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan celebrate 17th anniversary

The photo captures Aishwarya in a stylish beige dress and striking red lipstick. Meanwhile, Aaradhya radiated elegance beside her mom, and Abhishek stood proudly behind, completing the perfect family portrait. Take a look below!

Aaradhya Bachchan as per her cousin Navya Naveli Nanda

In a recent interview, Abhishek’s niece Navya Naveli Nanda praised Aaradhya’s remarkable wisdom, highlighting her advanced understanding compared to previous generations. She stated in an interview with The Times of India, “She’s far wiser than I was at her age. That’s a trend in general. Young kids today are so well-informed, that they’re far ahead of us. I was not as informed, wise or intelligent at her age. We have a strong generation of young women who want to change the world in so many ways, that’s an admirable trait I see in her as well.”

Bachchan family celebrates Holi

The Bachchan family, including Abhishek, Aishwarya, Shweta Bachchan, Jaya Bachchan, Amitabh Bachchan, and Navya Naveli Nanda, recently gathered for the Holika Dahan puja in Mumbai. They reunited at Amitabh’s Mumbai residence and took part in the traditional ceremony on the eve of the festival of colours.

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

Abhishek and Aishwarya’s journey from courtship to marriage has been a tale of love and commitment. The duo dated for a brief time and tied the knot in April 2007. They welcomed the arrival of their daughter Aaradhya in November 2011.

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s movies

In addition to this, Abhishek and Aishwarya have graced the silver screen together in several memorable films, including Dhai Akshar Prem Ke (2000), Kuch Na Kaho (2003), Umrao Jaan (2006), Dhoom 2 (2006), Guru (2007), Sarkaar Raj (2008) and Raavan (2010).
